verses.name: Colossians 4:13
verses.text: For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them that are in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.

verses.name: Colossians 4:14
verses.text: Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.

verses.name: Colossians 4:15
verses.text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.

verses.name: Colossians 4:16
verses.text: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.

verses.name: Colossians 4:17
verses.text: And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.
